title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Enterprise, Tourism and Employment) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister enterprise tourism employment) order 2025

title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Laura Mannion, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Laura Mannion, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Enterprise, Tourism and Employment, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Enterprise, Tourism and Employment 
with effect from 23 January 2025.
text_norm: 2 laura mannion particular whose address deposited office department enterprise tourism employment appointed special adviser minister enterprise tourism employment effect 23 january 2025

title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 3. Brian Keegan, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Brian Keegan, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Enterprise, Tourism and Employment, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Enterprise, Tourism and Employment 
with effect from 23 January 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

1 July, 2025. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Tánaiste. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th July, 2025.
